channel.title: Key Giveaway ~ Insanity
channel.description:
Anyway, our god, Teemo, have spoken, granting me the key to open the gate of Adiart Castle.
However... There is only **one** key..
Only the wise man could get the key to enter the castle of Adiart.
**Rule before entering giveaway**:
1. You did not own a copy of the game. 2. You have joined our Official ToL Discord. 3. Private message me in Forum the answer to my passage below and your discord name tag once you've decoded the passage.
**You'll get your key if you decrypted my message correctly.**
Here is your code that you need to decode with CATS and the wheel:
309530517419970013564694604650269825639178898780183191114134877913128991263141125394036577130080142505644104460631169190026818
**If you did not happened to solve it in 24 hours, then I am giving it to another person.**
Sorry, the event has ended :)

item.title: Key Giveaway ~ Insanity
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Anyway, our god, Teemo, have spoken, granting me the key to open the gate of Adiart Castle.

However… There is only one key…

Only the wise man could get the key to enter the castle of Adiart.

Rule before entering giveaway:

  1. You did not own a copy of the game.
  2. You have joined our Official ToL Discord.
  3. Private message me in Forum the answer to my passage below and your discord name tag once you’ve decoded the passage.

You’ll get your key if you decrypted my message correctly.

Here is your code that you need to decode with CATS and the wheel:

309530517419970013564694604650269825639178898780183191114134877913128991263141125394036577130080142505644104460631169190026818

If you did not happened to solve it in 24 hours, then I am giving it to another person.

Sorry, the event has ended
